name: Ida M. Pu
content: Dr Ida Pu | Goldsmiths, University of London Main menu Staff & students In this section Ida specialises in probabilistic and average case algorithms, data structures and communications and complexity theory. Staff details Position Lecturer Department Computing Email i.pu (@gold.ac.uk) Website http://www.doc.gold.ac.uk/~mas01ip Lecturer, deputy Senior Tutor, researcher, PhD supervisor and examiner, project manager, member of academic committee, equal opportunity representative, special needs coordinator. Areas of supervision Probabilistic and average case algorithms, data structures, networks and communications and complexity theory. Publications and research outputs BookFundamental Data Compression Pu, Ida . 2006. Fundamental Data Compression. 0-7506-6310-3: Elsevier.
